articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Sunday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun together with members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Party Central Military Commission prior to the plenary meeting of the WPK Central Committee and paid tribute to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Mu, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Jong Gak, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun, Thae Jong Su and other members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and the Party Central Military Commission.
					
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the Generalissimos stand.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid before them were a floral basket in the name of the WPK Central Committee and the Party Central Military Commission.
					
					 He, together with the participants, paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with the participants, paid homage to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Then he entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with the participants, paid homage to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Report on Plenary Meeting of WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Report on Plenary Meeting of WPK Central Committee 
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The historic March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea took place at the building of the WPK Central Committee, supreme staff of the Korean revolution, on Sunday.
					 First Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Un guided the meeting.
					
					 Present at the meeting were members and alternate members of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK.
					
					 Present there as observers were senior officials of ministries, national institutions, provincial, city and county committees of the WPK, complexes, major munitions factories and enterprises.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Taken up for discussion at the meeting were the following agenda items "1. On tasks of our Party on bringing about a decisive turn in accomplishing revolutionary cause of Juche as required by the present situation and the developing revolution", "2. On personnel affairs issue to be submitted to the 7th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly" and "3. On organizational matter".
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a report and concluding speech on the first agenda item.
					
					 The plenary meeting set forth a new strategic line on carrying out economic construction and building nuclear armed forces simultaneously under the prevailing situation and to meet the legitimate requirement of the developing revolution.
					
					 This line is a brilliant succession and development onto a new higher stage of the original line of simultaneously developing economy and national defence that was set forth and had been fully embodied by the great Generalissimos.
					
					 It was stressed at the meeting that the party's new line is not a temporary countermeasure for coping with the rapidly changing situation but a strategic line to be always held fast to, in the supreme interests of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The nuclear weapons of Songun Korea are not goods for getting U.S. dollars and they are neither a political bargaining chip nor a thing for economic dealings to be presented to the place of dialogue or be put on the table of negotiations aimed at forcing the DPRK to disarm itself.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear armed forces represent the nation's life which can never be abandoned as long as the imperialists and nuclear threats exist on earth. They are a treasure of a reunified country which can never be traded with billions of dollars. 
					
					 Only when the nuclear shield for self-defence is held fast, will it be possible to shatter the U.S. imperialists' ambition for annexing the Korean Peninsula by force and making the Korean people modern slaves, firmly defend our ideology, social system and all other socialist treasures won at the cost of blood and safeguard the nation's right to existence and its time-honored history and brilliant culture.
					
					 When the party's new line is thoroughly carried out, the DPRK will emerge as a great political, military and socialist economic power and a highly-civilized country which steers the era of independence.
					
					 The meeting set forth tasks for carrying out the new line and ways for doing so.
					
					 All the officials, party members and other people should wage bold offensive and all-people decisive battle with faith in sure victory and strong determination and thus make the flame of miracle and innovation sweep all fields of national economy.
					
					 The pilot fields of the national economy, the basic industrial fields should be drastically developed and production be increased to the maximum. Forces should be directed to agriculture and light industry, key fields in building an economic power to improve and put on a stable basis the people's living standard at the earliest possible date.
					
					 The self-reliant nuclear power industry should be developed and the work for developing light water reactor be dynamically promoted to actively contribute to easing the strain on the electricity problem of the country.
					
					 Spurs should be given to the development of space science and technology and more advanced satellites including communications satellites be developed and launched. 
					
					 The country's economy should be shifted into knowledge-based economy and the foreign trade be made multilateral and diversified and investment be widely introduced.
					
					 The economic guidance shall be fundamentally improved as required by the new situation and Korean-style advantageous economic management methods be completed by embodying the Juche idea.
					
					 The DPRK's possession of nukes should be fixed by law and the nuclear armed forces should be expanded and beefed up qualitatively and quantitatively until the denuclearization of the world is realized.
					
					 The People's Army should perfect the war method and operation in the direction of raising the pivotal role of the nuclear armed forces in all aspects concerning the war deterrence and the war strategy, and the nuclear armed forces should always round off the combat posture.
					
					 As a responsible nuclear weapons state, the DPRK will make positive efforts to prevent the nuclear proliferation, ensure peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world and realize the denuclearization of the world.
					
					 Institutions in charge of security and safeguard, judicial and prosecution and people's security and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces should resolutely foil the vicious moves of the imperialist reactionaries and class enemies, devotedly defend the party, social system and people and surely guarantee the new line of the party with arms and by law.
					
					 The party and working people's organizations and power bodies should increase their militant function and role in every way in the struggle for implementing the party's line.
					
					 The meeting entrusted the Presidium of the SPA and the Cabinet with the matters of taking legal, administrative and technical measures for implementing the tasks.
					
					 At the meeting a decision on the first agenda item "On carrying out economic construction and building nuclear armed forces simultaneously and thus bringing earlier the final victory in the cause of building a thriving socialist nation" was adopted with unanimous approval.
					
					 The second agenda item, personal affairs issue to be submitted to the 7th Session of the 12th SPA, was discussed and decided at the meeting.
					
					 The meeting also dealt with an organizational matter, its third agenda item.
					
					 Members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, members and alternate members of the Political Bureau were recalled and new ones were elected to fill vacancies.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju was elected to fill a vacancy of a member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik and Choe Pu Il were elected to fill vacancies of alternate members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Members and alternate members of the WPK Central Committee were recalled and new ones were elected to fill vacancies.
					
					 Upon authorization of Kim Jong Un, Paek Kye Ryong was appointed as director of the Light Industrial Department of the WPK Central Committee and Yun U Chol as editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, organ of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK were also recalled and new ones were elected to fill vacancies.

articles.title: Arms Buildup of U.S. Forces in South Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Arms Buildup of U.S. Forces in South Korea Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea released the following statement Sunday:
					 It has been disclosed that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have been drastically reinforced in the last one to two years in south Korea against the backdrop of their reckless war moves against the DPRK, stunning public at home and abroad.
					
					 According to the "2012 report on structure of bases" published by the U.S. Defense Department last year, the number of the U.S. forces in south Korea increased nearly 11 000 troops in September 2009.
					
					 Many latest war hardware including at least 160 Bradley armored cars, over 120 M1-A2 Abrams new type heavy tanks, 83 anti-mine special cars and 24 F-16 fighter bombers were additionally deployed in the U.S. forces in south Korea from 2011 to 2012.
					
					 This year the U.S. seeks to reintroduce into south Korea the 23rd chemical battalion which was withdrawn in 2004, double AH-64D Apache helicopter squadrons and reinforce Patriot missile forces.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea have been reinforced by troops equal to one division in one to two years. The U.S. is mulling steadily introducing ultra-modern war hardware into it. This is a very dangerous move to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. together with the south Korean puppet forces is busy staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war maneuvers against the DPRK with nuclear submarines, B-52, B-2A and other strategic weapons involved, openly revealing its attempt to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, it is prodding the puppet warmongers into military provocations, vociferating about the "plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war".
					
					 The reinforcement of the U.S. forces in south Korea is part of such moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to its pivot-to-Asia-Pacific strategy, the U.S. is set to use south Korea as an outpost for holding military hegemony in Northeast Asia and carrying out its strategy for "world hegemony." 
					
					 The U.S. is kicking up a frantic racket for "sanctions" and intensifying war exercises against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and nuclear test for self-defence, deliberately escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula. This is aimed to secure a pretext for perpetuating the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea and provoking a war of aggression.
					
					 Massive reinforcement of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea will only result in straining the regional situation, escalating arms race and increasing the danger of war.
					
					 This troop reinforcement should never be allowed and the public at home and abroad should keep vigilance against it and bitterly denounce it.
					
					 The U.S. forces should should be withdrawn from south Korea at once.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will resolutely foil any aggression move of the U.S. and deal military retaliatory blows at the U.S. military bases and aggression forces in south Korea before anything else.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Seventh Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They entered the hall where the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il stand before paying tribute to them.
					
					 At the halls to immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state, the deputies made a bow to them in humble reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls in which orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches they used during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Seventh Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Sunday.
					 The laid a wreath and bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who devoted her noble life to the liberation of the country and its people's happiness and opened a bright future of the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They also visited the Breast Tumor Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and the Fitness Center in Thongil Street.

articles.title: DPRK's High Level of Science and Technology Appreciated by Ugandan PM
articles.content:
DPRK's High Level of Science and Technology Appreciated by Ugandan PM
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Ugandan Prime Minister Amama Umbabazi met with Jong Thae Yang, DPRK ambassador to his country, on March 25.
					 The DPRK succeeded in putting a satellite into orbit last year, the prime minister said, adding this is a demonstration of a high level of its science and technology.
					
					 The Ugandan government expresses concern over the tension prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, he noted, supporting the DPRK's proposal for achieving national reunification by federal formula.

articles.title: Local Army-People Meetings Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Local Army-People Meetings Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provincial army-people meetings were held on Saturday to support the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and to achieve victory in the final do-or-die battle of all-people resistance against the aggressors including the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 At the meetings the statement of the Supreme Command of the KPA was read out to be followed by the speeches by the delegates from the KPA, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, the Young Red Guards and the discharged soldiers.  
					
					 The speakers said the statement of the KPA Supreme Command serves as an ultimatum to the U.S. and the south Korean puppets, a warning against the forces following the U.S. in its high-handed and arbitrary practices and a just decisive step of the DPRK which regards its sovereignty as its life.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists recklessly move to ignite a war, the service personnel of the KPA will not miss that opportunity and inflict a pre-emptive merciless fire of annihilation upon the enemies to wipe out them and achieve the great cause of national reunification at any cost, they noted, adding:
					
					 The members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards will thoroughly annihilate with the tremendous might of civilian forces of Songun Korea and in the spirit of devotedly defending the country the enemies who are making a false show of power, counting on their numeric superiority.
					
					 The discharged soldiers will strike and destroy the U.S. mainland and its bases in the operational theatres in the Pacific including Hawaii and Guam and its military bases in south Korea, blow up the White House and Chongwadae, the dens of evils, and thus certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification, they stressed.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.

articles.title: Special Prayer Meeting Marks Eastertide
articles.content:
Special Prayer Meeting Marks Eastertide 
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A special prayer meeting took place at the Jangchung Cathedral in Pyongyang on Sunday to mark the Eastertide. 
					 Present there were members of the Central Committee of the Catholic Association of Korea, believers in Pyongyang, members of the regional association from all local areas and foreigners staying in the DPRK. 
					
					 A ceremony was held following an address delivered by Kim Chol Ung, chief of the Jangchung Cathedral. 
					
					 The participants prayed for the earlier realization of peace and independent reunification of Korea, revival of the nation, under the benevolence of the Lord, amid the pleasure of greeting the revival of Christ.
					
					 At the meeting a sermon and gospel were recited according to the Catholic precedent before a special lecture by the chief of the Cathedral.
					
					 He congratulated the fellow Christian brothers and foreign friends on the Eastertide. 
					
					 He said that the global peace and destiny of the Korean nation are being seriously threatened due to the big powers' highhanded and arbitrary practices even though the love of the Lord and peace should be realized. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Now the situation of the Korean Peninsula has gone beyond the danger line owing to the vicious anti-DPRK "sanctions" and reckless provocations for a nuclear war by the U.S. and its allies including south Korea. The worst physical conflict presupposing the exchange of fire and nukes has now become unavoidable. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces even openly let loose such reckless remarks that they were aiming with precision weapons at the statues of the great Generalissimos, supreme incarnations of love and trust and benevolent fathers of the nation, whom the world progressives desirous of justice look up to. This is the most monstrous and inhumane crime little short of stabbing dagger into the hearts of world progressives including the Korean people as well as the open declaration of a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The Catholic believers realizing love, peace and justice should actively turn out in the actions to put the group of Satans into the red hot iron-pot of Hell. 
					
					 He conveyed the teaching of the Lord that one who made others shed blood are bound to shed his own blood and every sin brings punishment with it. He called for mercilessly punishing the group of Satans which brought the root cause of misfortune to this land, which was created to be the one by the Lord, and sufferings of division to the Korean nation for nearly seven decades. He also called upon the Catholic believers in the north and the south to fulfill their duties in the just sacred war for achieving independent reunification, revival of the nation, at an early date. 
					
					 He expressed expectation that the world Catholic community and progressives would fully support the cause of the DPRK to defend peace and justice. 
					
					 The participants renewed the firm resolution to put the warmongers into the red hot iron-pot of Hell as early as possible and build a peaceful and prosperous reunified country.

articles.title: U.S. Keen to Bring Down Social System of DPRK: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Keen to Bring Down Social System of DPRK: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK aimed at wantonly violating its sovereignty and supreme interests have reached the extremely dangerous phase and a warlike satiation in which a war is unavoidable is created on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The U.S. has become evermore undisguised and desperate in its hostile acts against the DPRK in the 1990s when the nuclear confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. started against the backdrop of the temporary trials faced by the socialist movement.
					
					 The nuclear showdown which stunned the world was a product of the U.S. brigandish moves to destroy the DPRK. It was an all-out confrontation in political, military and diplomatic fields.
					
					 The U.S. made the story of "collapse of social system" in the DPRK an established fact and floated a story about its "collapse". It has desperately staged a conspiratorial farce to brand the DPRK as "a proliferater of nuclear weapons and WMDs", totally negating the stand of the DPRK's government to exercise the right to use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes.
					
					 In the new century it listed the DPRK as an "axis of evil" and a "target of preemptive nuclear attack" after suspending all dialogues and negotiations with the DPRK. It has escalated its moves for confrontation with the DPRK, describing it as "an advanced base of tyranny " and "a target to be totally destroyed".
					
					 The U.S. also built international public opinion to shift the blame for the deadlocked six-party talks onto the DPRK.
					
					 It has been busy with a propaganda campaign to slander the ideology of the DPRK and its socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 It stooped to any infamy to fabricate the "north Korean human rights act," distorting the human rights situation in the DPRK.
					
					  The U.S. spread fictions about "drug trafficking", "counterfeit notes", "persecution of religion", "training of computer hackers", "arms smuggling" in a bid to isolate the DPRK, stunning the international community.
					
					 It has persisted in its ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare.
					
					 A group for "bringing down statues" was organized under the U.S. supervision. Its basic aim was to destabilize the DPRK and topple its social system through subversive activities and sabotages. This is a politically-motivated hideous terrorism that can never be pardoned.
					
					 The above-said hostile acts of the U.S. found a more vivid manifestation in its moves to blockade and suffocate the DPRK economically.
					
					 It has cooked up nearly five "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK over the past 8 years through such hand-raising machine as the UN Security Council in a crafty and vicious bid to internationalize its unilateral "sanctions" and plug more countries into enforcing them.  It openly disclosed its criminal scenario to bring down the ideology and social system of the DPRK through its moves to stifle the latter politically and economically and threaten and blackmail the latter militarily.
					
					 The joint military exercises staged by the U.S. every year under the pretext of "defense" assumed more aggressive and undisguised offensive nature of preemptive nuclear attack and they have been steadily escalated to be large-scale war drills.
					
					  The U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK are rejected by the world progressives as it is hideous crime in wanton violation of international law and justice.

articles.title: Anniversary of Registration of Kim Jong Il as Honorary Farmer Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Registration of Kim Jong Il as Honorary Farmer Marked
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The 30th anniversary of the registration of leader Kim Jong Il as honorary farmer at the Wonhwa Cooperative Farm in Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province was marked in the DPRK.
					 The farm registered Kim Jong Il as its honorary farm on March 31, 1983.
					
					 He visited the farm more than ten times to lead it to bring about a turn in agricultural production.
					
					 Visiting Wonhwa-ri on his birthday, February 16, 1969, he gave concrete instructions for increasing grain production and managing fruit trees and cultivating lots of new land as taught by President Kim Il Sung during his field guidance to it.
					
					 Kim Il Sung sent it books on agricultural science and technology he read at home and even a radio he used and trucks and new type tractors before any farms.
					
					 He also made sure that dwelling houses, school, hospital, shop, etc. were built to give a face-lift to the farm.
					
					 A meeting for marking the anniversary took place Sunday.
					
					 A reporter said that the farm has turned into a significant place conveying long the undying revolutionary relics of the peerlessly great men and a socialist cultural countryside good to work and live in as it is holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as honorary farmers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Sacred War of Justice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Sacred War of Justice 
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's all-out action represents the most just and sacred war and a genuine patriotic war for defending peace as it is aimed to root out the source of national disaster and achieve peace and reunification of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Unshakable are the resolution and will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to root out the source of a nuclear war against it through merciless and practical military actions and realize the historic desire of the Korean nation for national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are escalating the offensive to isolate and stifle the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and frantically staging provocative joint military exercises for preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK, terming the nuclear test for self-defence conducted by it to cope with such moves "threat."
					
					 It makes no sense to expect peace from the warmongers coming in attack with sophisticated weapons.
					
					 It is the only way of ensuring durable peace on this land to blow up the citadel of war.
					
					 The new regime in south Korea is following in the footsteps of traitor Lee Myung Bak who pursued confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 This is evidenced by the following facts: The south Korean authorities were closeted with the U.S. over the provision of "extended deterrence" for preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK against the backdrop of the on-going Foal Eagle joint military drills. They signed a "plan for jointly coping with provocation of local war" and kicked up a noisy anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign in the international arena. Conservative media recently disclosed that a hideous operational plan was worked out to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership. 
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors is the cancer-like entities lying in the way of national reunification as it is going mad with the moves to provoke a nuclear war in league with foreign forces, opposed to national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The only conclusion drawn by the DPRK is that the poisonous herbs fostering national division and confrontation should be mercilessly rooted out by arms so that they may not sprout again. This is the only way of removing the root cause of national split and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Military's Hideous Scenario to Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Military's Hideous Scenario to Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- South Korean military gangsters worked out a plan for making precision missile strikes at the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang and other big cities of the DPRK, according to a recent issue of the south Korean Chosun Ilbo.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 Their hysteric scenario to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership is a deliberate provocation against its army and people.
					
					 It is not the first time that the puppet group disclosed such scenario.
					
					 Nothing has changed in south Korea since the emergence of a new regime there.
					
					 Chongwadae is conniving at and patronizing the military gangsters in their desperate moves, working out a concrete operation plan to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership. Herein lies the gravity of the situation. This is another clear indication that the new regime in south Korea is not different from the Lee Myung Bak regime but is pursuing the same confrontation with fellow countrymen as it did.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that such hideous plot is being hatched by those gangsters at a time when the U.S. nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK have entered into the phase of an actual war.
					
					 Those who dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, while escalating confrontation, will not be able to go scot-free no matter where they are, but face a merciless punishment by its army and people. This was a solemn warning served by the DPRK already.
					
					 This warning is by no means an empty talk. They are now waiting for the time for a final decisive battle, their hearts burning with the will to blow up the center for hatching plots including Chongwadae, the cesspool of all evils.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Joint Plan of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces for Aggression
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Joint Plan of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces for Aggression
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces signed a "joint plan to cope with the provocation of a local war". Its keynote calls on the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces to cope together with the south Korean puppet army with the local war allegedly to be provoked by the north. It, therefore, touched off great concern at home and abroad as soon as it was announced. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said plan is aimed to reinforce the U.S. military domination over south Korea and lay a favorable springboard to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula any moment.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. is talking rubbish that the plan serves as a way of reducing the possibility of a war on the peninsula. 
					
					 The plan is nothing but a dangerous scenario for igniting an all-out war, prompted by the criminal intention of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to start a new nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The war hysteria of the group of the puppet military gangsters has reached such phase as openly disclosing their hideous scenario to dare bring down the sacred monuments to the great Generalissimos in different parts of the DPRK.
					
					 It is needless to say that the situation has led to such catastrophe as the U.S. has zealously protected the south Korean puppet forces and instigated them to the war moves.
					
					 Option is not a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 It is the DPRK's right to self-defense to take a countermeasure to cope with the plan now that it has become clear that the U.S. scenario for a nuclear war has reached the phase of its implementation.
					
					 If the U.S. and its lackeys ignite a war, the army and the people of the DPRK will wipe out the aggressors to the last man and raze their facilities and military bases to the ground.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Ridiculous Rhetoric
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Their Ridiculous Rhetoric 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are busy trumpeting about "rallying forces to consolidate system", "intentionally orchestrated farce", "high degree of  psychological warfare" and "activities for demonstrating its power" in reference to the  toughest countermeasures taken by the DPRK. These are part of their rhetoric aimed to downplay its resolution to annihilate the enemies and will to wage a final decisive battle and escape punishment. 
					 The puppet group of traitors is spreading even an odd story about "unstable social system".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 Their despicable behavior is nothing but a ploy of cowards to seek a sort of consolation, terrified by the DPRK's expression of its strong will to defend the sovereignty and the last shriek of those facing destruction. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 What is the height of sarcasm is that the puppet forces are busy with conducting false propaganda, while spreading the story about "unstable social system."
					
					 The poor authorities of south Korea are now at a loss how to put under control the deplorable situation where their support rate is the lowest ever since the appearance of the regime, forsaken by the people for their extreme arrogance and unpopularity. Yet, they are talking nonsense about "unstable social system" in the north. This is a strange political cartoon rare to be found anywhere else. 
					
					 With no sleight of hand can they tarnish the dignity of the DPRK and escape punishment.
					
					  By meeting death only the puppet group can pay for such crime as daring hurt the supreme dignity of the nation, while persisting in provocations. 
					
					 As already declared, the DPRK will mercilessly punish the U.S. and its lackeys on behalf of all Koreans.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Denying Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Denying Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Recently, Japanese Prime Minister Abe blustered that there is no evidence proving the coercive nature of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the crime should not be regarded as a political and diplomatic issue and it should be left to historians and experts to discuss the matter at a quiet place. Echoing his utterances, those styling themselves high-ranking politicians of Japan are letting loose a spate of sophism in a bid to create impression that it was falsely  accused, asserting that it is necessary to reexamine "Kono's  statement" which admitted  the crimes related to the sexual slavery and the statement was "a diplomatic error".
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is symptoms of doom for a corrupt country in which not a shred of humanity can be found.
					
					 What  Japan did in the  past is the unpardonable monstrous crimes against humanity but its present approach toward the crimes is the thrice-cursed ones, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The actions taking a serious note of Japan's past crimes and calling for their liquidation are gaining momentum in the international arena. A brisk action is taking place even in the U.S., an ally of Japan, to condemn the crimes related to sexual slavery and call for their settlement. This reflects the will of the international community not to allow Japan's past crimes to be buried into oblivion.
					
					 Japan should never evade its moral responsibility before the international community.
					
					 Japan is resorting to the moves for distorting history and persecuting Koreans in Japan, far from admitting and making apology and reparation for the historic crimes committed by it against the Korean people. This is another hideous crime pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to an extreme phase.
					
					 Japan should stop acting rashly, pondering over the grave consequences to be entailed by its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Provokers Will Meet Miserable End: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Provokers Will Meet Miserable End: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The world will clearly see how the provokers, who encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, meet a miserable end in the sea of fire of justice to be kindled by the army and people of the DPRK who rose up to defend its sovereignty, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Sunday.
					 No matter how desperately the warlike forces may try to cover the Foal Eagle joint military exercises with the veil of "peace", they can never conceal the aggressive nature of the test nuclear war, the article says, and goes on:
					
					  Foal Eagle is a preliminary war and a test nuclear war as same as the Team Spirit joint military drills except its codename.
					
					  The on-going joint military drills activated the formation of strategic bombers and nuclear submarines capable of loading nuclear warheads.
					
					 The introduction of nuclear war means into the joint military drills by the U.S. imperialists is aimed to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is blustering that it would continue threats and blackmail against the DPRK while staging nuclear war drills in south Korea and in waters around it after introducing B-52 and nuclear submarine in a bid to test the DPRK's will and dampen its resolute determination.
					
					 But the DPRK's army and people will never be frightened by such threats and blackmail.
					
					 Now that the U.S. has started open nuclear blackmail and threats, the DPRK will take military action to cope with them.
					
					 The DPRK's declaration is by no means an empty word.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to test the will of the DPRK and dampen its determination with such vicious hostile acts of nuclear blackmail, far from understanding who its rival is. It should not behave foolishly.
					
					  The Anderson air force base on Guam from which strategic bombers take lift and Japan proper and naval bases in Okinawa from where nuclear submarines are launched are within the striking distance of the DPRK's precision strike means.

articles.title: DPRK's Practical Military Action Is Just: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Practical Military Action Is Just: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on Friday convened an operation meeting at which he examined and ratified the plan of the Strategic Rocket Force for firepower strike.
					 Prior to it, the KPA Supreme Command in a statement solemnly declared at home and abroad that the DPRK would demonstrate the will of all its service personnel and people for resolute counteraction through a practical military action.
					
					 This is a just step to put a definite end to the U.S. ever-mounting moves for nuclear blackmail with merciless nuclear attack and defend the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 Involved in the nuclear war drills now under way throughout south Korea are huge nuclear war hardware including nuclear submarine Cheyenne, B-52 and B-2A which earned an ill-fame during the last Iraqi war. They are now busy staging drills for making nuclear strikes at targets in the depth of the DPRK. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that it is not hiding the fact that the major target of these nuclear attacks is the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 Looking back on the 60 odd year-long history of the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK, there has never been such time as today when its cruelty and danger reached such an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula has entered a phase of its full-dress implementation, the stage of an actual war.
					
					 The outbreak of the second Korean war, a nuclear war is not a hypothesis but is becoming a reality.
					
					 It is the invariable aim sought by the U.S. to reduce everything in the DPRK to ashes in a twinkle through surprise "preemptive nuclear strike" and thus secure a bridgehead for realizing its strategy for world hegemony.
					
					 The touch-and-go situation prevailing on the peninsula is a product of the U.S. dangerous hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail against it from A to Z.
					
					 It is the truth learned by the DPRK in the course of protracted confrontation with the U.S. that neither peace nor prosperity of the nation nor national reunification can be achieved unless the U.S. imperialists are eliminated.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces are keeping themselves most highly alerted with the will to react to the U.S. nuclear blackmail with merciless nuclear attack and a war of aggression with an all-out war of justice.
					
					 The cause of the DPRK's army and people out in the final stage of the all-out action against the U.S. is just and sure to win.
					
					 Their practical military action against the U.S. is the just cause to root out the cause of a war from the earth.
					
					 We are led by the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu matchless in grit and stratagem and have Korean-style tremendous precision nuclear strike means and nuclear war methods.
					
					 The world will see how the DPRK will raze the U.S., the empire of evils, to the ground and emerge victorious.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Accuses Japan of Distorting History
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Accuses Japan of Distorting History
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Peace in Asia and Education in History of south Korea denounced Japan for distorting history on Mar. 26.
					 The organization referred to the fact that the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan passed the textbooks for senior high schools for next year, adding that Tok Islets are designated as Japan's territory in all textbooks of geography and political economy.
					
					 This proves that Japan seeks to use the textbooks as tools for inciting the revival of militarism and ambition of territorial expansion, the organization noted.
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to delete the part dealing with the claim to Tok Islets from the textbooks.

articles.title: Consequences of Treacherous FTA Exposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Consequences of Treacherous FTA Exposed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- At least 30 organizations of south Korea including the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Women's Solidarity, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a joint commentary on March 26 to expose the consequences entailed by the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S.
					 Referring to the fact that one year has passed since the U.S-south Korea FTA took effect, the commentary said that the problems the people were concerned about have been revealed during the period.
					
					 The "government" told to the public that south Korea's export to the U.S. hit a record level but in fact it has not reached half before the conclusion of FTA, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 Various fields have been suffered from difficulties due to the brigandish demand of U.S. businesses. South Korea has thus been deluged with American agricultural products, posing big threats to the existence of the south Korean peasants.
					
					 The "government", far from making a serious reflection on this, is seeking to conclude FTA with Japan and other countries.
					
					 The authorities will face people's resistance in case they do not stop the negotiations at once.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers Assailed
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Maneuvers Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Japan Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a general meeting in Tokyo on March 26 to denounce the north-targeted nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 Solidarity addresses from the North Side Committee, the South Side Committee, and regional committees of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration were introduced at the general meeting.
					
					 Kwak Tong Ui, chairman of the Japan Regional Committee, in a speech urged the south Korean present "government" to stop the disgraceful "alliance" with the U.S., get reconciled with the north and opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 This year's action program of the Japan Regional Committee was published at the general meeting.
					
					 The committee said it would wage the dynamic movement for opposing the U.S. and south Korean belligerent forces' war maneuvers, implementing the north-south joint declarations and strengthening the committee.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 An appeal to all overseas Koreans was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It called for channeling all efforts into opposing the U.S.-south Korea reckless nuclear war maneuvers and shattering all moves for aggression.
					
					 It also called for expanding and strengthening All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and discharging the role of overseas Koreans in achieving the unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and our People" was published at the N.K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 The work issued on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) sets forth tasks to firmly safeguard the lifelong revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their ideas and add more glory to them.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on March 23.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Italy
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Rome on March 25 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					  Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary life and feats of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in India
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in India
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in New Delhi on March 21.
					 Dr. Aloke Kalla, former vice-chancellor of Delhi University, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including meeting, lecture and seminar on the exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the human cause of independence.

articles.title: DPRK's Victory in Korean War to Be Celebrated in Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Victory in Korean War to Be Celebrated in Nepal
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Nepali national committee was formed in Kathmandu on March 25 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The inaugural ceremony discussed issues of celebrating the anniversary with splendor.
					
					 Madav Kumar Nepal, leader of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events on the anniversary and conduct a signature campaign in support of the just cause of the Korean people for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and protecting its sovereignty from Mar. 26 to July 27.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Lambasted
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Lambasted
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ethiopia and France released statements on March 23 and 24 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their followers for working hard to stifle the DPRK.
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 The "resolution on sanctions" is a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK to disarm itself and suffocate it economically.
					
					 The DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test was a just measure taken by it to cope with the U.S. and its allies which took issue with it over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 But the U.S. is staging joint military exercises threatening the peace-loving Korean people.
					
					 In view of the prevailing grave situation, the DPRK took a step to defend its sovereignty from the threat of enemies.
					
					 We call upon all the world peace-loving people to turn out in the struggle to support the Korean people in their just cause and foil the moves of the U.S. to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association accused the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppets of faking up a "plan for jointly countering provocation of a local war" the keynote of which is to unleash an all-out nuclear war against the DPRK. It went on:
					
					 We cannot allow the military attack of the U.S. and its allies on the righteous Korean people.
					
					 We demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the war moves escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 24 denouncing the U.S. and south Korea for their human rights campaign against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. imperialists are resorting again to a hackneyed human rights campaign against the DPRK while staging large-scale nuclear war maneuvers against it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UN Human Rights Council into cooking up a "resolution" slandering the DPRK.
					
					 The pro-U.S. puppet group of traitors in south Korea took the lead in the smear campaign against fellow countrymen in league with the U.S.
					
					 Some Western countries and Japan joined in the U.S. smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The UN Human Rights Council through its illegal and unprecedented "human rights resolution" revealed once again that it is a servant for the U.S.
					
					 U.S. "human rights champions" are keeping mum about the U.S. human rights abuses in different parts of the world.
					
					 There is no "human rights" issue in the DPRK.
					
					 No matter what desperate moves the hostile forces may resort to, fabricating an "investigation committee," they can neither break the single-minded unity of the DPRK nor bring down the socialist system of Korean style.
					
					 Stop at once the "human rights campaign" against the DPRK!
					
					 No interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 31, junto con los miembros del Buro Politico del Comite Central y de la Comision Militar Central del PTC el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, antes del pleno del CC del PTC, y rindio el homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Mu, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Jong Gak, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun, Thae Jong Su y otros miembros del Buro Politico del Comite Central y de la Comision Militar Central del PTC. 
					
					Ante las estatuas de bronce de pie de los Generalisimos fueron colocados un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC. 
					
					El Mariscal junto con sus acompanantes rindio el sublime homenaje a los Grandes Hombres sin iguales en el hall donde se hallan las estatuas de bronce de pie de los Generalisimos y los salones de eternidad donde se conservan sus cuerpos.

articles.title: Informacion sobre el pleno del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Informacion sobre el pleno del CC del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 31 en la sede del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Estado Mayor Supremo de la Revolucion Coreana, el historico pleno de marzo de 2013 del CC del PTC.
					Lo presidio el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC. 
					
					En el acto estuvieron presentes los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC del PTC y los miembros de la Comision Central Revisora del Partido.
					
					Asistieron en calidad de observador los funcionarios directivos de los ministerios, organos centrales, los comites provinciales, urbanos y distritales del Partido, los complejos, las importantes fabricas y empresas de materiales belicos.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Se presentaron las siguientes agendas: "1. Sobre las tareas de nuestro partido para lograr el cambio decisivo en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche conforme a la demanda de la situacion actual y la revolucion en desarrollo", "2. Sobre el asunto de cuadros a someterse a la consideracion del septimo periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema" y "3. Sobre el  tema de organizacion".
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un presento el informe sobre la primera agenda y pronuncio un discurso resumen.
					
					El conclave presento una nueva linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y las fuerzas armadas nucleares de acuerdo con las exigencias legitimas de la situacion actual y la revolucion coreana en desarrollo. 
					
					Esta linea es la brillante continuacion, profundizacion y desarrollo a una nueva etapa alta de la original linea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la defensa nacional, presentada y ejecutada cabalmente por los Grandes Generalisimos.
					
					El foro apunto que esta nueva linea del PTC no es una contramedida temporal para hacer frente a la situacion en cambio repentino sino es la linea estrategica a ser mantenida para defender los maximos intereses de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Las armas nucleares de la Corea del Songun no son una mercancia a ser cambiada con el dolar norteamericano ni un regateo politico o economico a discutirse en la mesa del dialogo con quienes intentan el desarme de la RPDC. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC devienen la vida de la nacion nunca renunciable ni cambiable con dinero, mientras existen en nuestro planeta el imperialismo y la amenaza nuclear, y patrimonio nacional de la Corea reunificada. 
					
					Solo cuando mantengamos con firmeza el escudo nuclear de autodefensa, podemos defender con firmeza nuestra ideologia, nuestro regimen y todas las riquezas socialistas conquistadas a precio de la sangre, el derecho a la existencia, la larga historia y la brillante cultura de la nacion, frustrando la ambicion del imperialismo norteamericano de apoderarse militarmente de la Peninsula Coreana y convertir al pueblo coreano en el esclavo de version moderna. 
					
					Cuando se materialice cabalmente la nueva linea de paralelo, presentada por el PTC, la RPDC se convertira en la gran potencia politica, la militar y la economica socialista y en el pais civilizado que orienta la epoca de la independencia.
					
					El foro planteo las tareas y remedios que se presentan en la materializacion de la linea para desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores deben desplegar con la firme fe en el triunfo y la decision extraordinaria la campana ofensiva audaz y la batalla decisiva de todo el pueblo para avivar las llamas de milagros e innovaciones en todos los sectores de la economia nacional.
					
					Deben mejorar decisivamente los dominios avanzados de la economia nacional, o sea, las industrias basicas, para aumentar al maximo la produccion, concentrar las fuerzas en la agricultura y la industria ligera, dominios mas importantes de la construccion de la potencia economica para estabilizar y mejorar lo mas pronto posible la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Es preciso impulsar con vigor el desarrollo de la industria de energia nuclear independiente y de reactor para contribuir activamente a resolver el problema de tensa electricidad del pais. 
					
					Deben desarrollar y lanzar mucho mas satelites mas sofisticados dando acicate al adelanto de ciencia y tecnologia del cosmos.
					
					Hay que convertir la economia nacional en la basada en intelectualidad, diversificar el comercio exterior e introducir las inversiones. 
					
					Es necesario mejorar radicalmente la direccion economica de acuerdo con las demandas de la realidad en desarrollo y perfeccionar los ventajosos metodos de administracion economica a nuestro estilo basados en la idea Juche. 
					
					Fijaremos legalmente la posicion de nuestra Republica como pais con armas nucleares, ampliaremos y fortaleceremos en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares hasta que se realice la desnuclearizacion del mundo entero.
					
					El Ejercito Popular de Corea debe perfeccionar los metodos y operaciones de combate, en rumbo a elevar el papel medular de las fuerzas armadas nucleares en todos los aspectos del disuasivo de guerra y la estrategia de cumplimiento de guerra, y completar la disposicion ordinaria de combate de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					La RPDC, siendo responsable pais con armas nucleares, hara ingentes esfuerzos por prevenir la proliferacion nuclear, defender la paz y seguridad de Asia y el resto del mundo y realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo. 
					
					Los organos de seguridad estatal, los judiciales y fiscales, los de seguridad del pueblo y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea deben defender a riesgo de la vida el partido, el regimen y el pueblo frustrando tajantemente los viles complots de los reaccionarios imperialistas y los enemigos clasistas y asegurar en lo militar y legal la linea de paralelo del PTC. 
					
					En la lucha por materializar esta linea, las organizaciones del partido y las entidades de masas y los organos del poder deben elevar por todos los medios su funcion combativa y papel. 
					
					El conclave encargo al Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y al Consejo de Ministros tomar las medidas legales, administrativas y practicas para cumplir las tareas presentadas. 
					
					En la sesion plenaria quedo aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre la primera agenda "Para adelantar la victoria final de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista desarrollando paralelamente la construccion economica y las fuerzas armadas nucleares". 
					
					El foro discutio y aprobo la segunda agenda.
					
					En el debate de la tercera agenda, fueron destituidos o electos suplementariamente miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y miembro y miembros suplentes del Buro Politico, del CC del PTC. 
					
					Pak Pong Ju fue electo suplementariamente como miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC. 
					
					Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik y Choe Pu Il fueron electos suplementariamente como miembros suplentes del Buro Politico del CC del PTC. 
					
					Tambien fueron destituidos o electos algunos miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del PTC. 
					
					Por encargo del Mariscal, fueron nombrados Paek Kye Ryong como jefe del Departamento de Industria Ligera del CC del PTC, y Yun U Chol, como editor jefe del periodico Rodong Sinmun, organo del CC del PTC.
					
					El foro revoco y cubrio las vacancias de algunos miembros de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC.

articles.title: CNCDP rechaza aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
s033102 - CNCDP rechaza aumento armamentista de EE.UU. en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 31 la siguiente declaracion:
					En estos tiempos en que llegan al climax las imprudentes maniobras norteamericanas de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se ha revelado el hecho de que en los ultimos dos anos se han aumentado considerablemente las tropas agresoras yanquis ocupantes del Sur de Corea, provocando la indignacion de los nacionales y extranjeros. 
					
					Segun el "informe de estructura de bases de 2012", publicado el ano pasado por el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos, el numero de efectivos norteamericanos estacionados en el suelo surcoreano se incremento a mas de 11 mil en comparacion con el septiembre del 2009. 
					
					En cuanto a los pertrechos belicos, desde 2011 hasta 2012 se emplazaron adicionalmente a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea incontables equipos de guerra ultramodernos, entre otros, mas de 160 carros blindados Bradley, mas de 120 tanques pesados modernos M1-A2 Abrams, 83 carros especiales anti-mina y 24 cazabombarderos F-16.
					
					Este ano, EE.UU. intenta ubicar otra vez el batallon quimico no. 23, que se habia retirado en 2004, aumentar a dos los batallones de helicopteros Apache AH-64D y reforzar las fuerzas de misil Patriot.
					
					Las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea aumentan en menos de dos anos los uniformados equivalentes a una division entera e introducen incesantemente los pertrechos belicos de punta con el fin de desatar de todos modos la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ahora EE.UU. se entrega con frenesi junto con los titeres surcoreanos a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" movilizando los submarinos nucleares, los cazabombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-52, los cazabombarderos estrategicos nucleares Stealth B-2A y otras armas estrategicas, revelando abiertamente el intento de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, instiga a los belicistas surcoreanos a la provocacion militar hablando del "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local".
					
					Tal aumento armamentista de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea es un eslabon de la campana de provocacion de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					El imperio persigue la estrategia de dar importancia a la region de Asia-Pacifico y pretende utilizar mas el suelo surcoreano como una base avanzada favorable a mantener la hegemonia militar en el Nordeste Asiatico y cumplir la estrategia de "heguemonia mundial".
					
					Para obtener el pretexto de la presencia de sus tropas en el suelo surcoreano y de la provocacion de guerra de agresion, EE.UU. agrava intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al recurrir cruelmente a la "sancion" y los ejercicios belicos cuestionando el legitimo lanzamiento de satelite y la prueba nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					El aumento de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas en el suelo surcoreano agravara mas la situacion de la region y aumentaran la carrera armamentista y el peligro de guerra. 
					
					Es intolerable el aumento armamentista de tropas yanquis en el Sur de Corea y lo debe rechazar fuertemente con alta vigilancia la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					Las tropas yanquis ocupantes del territorio surcoreano no deben ser aumentadas sino retiradas cuanto antes.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC frustraran tajantemente cualesquier agresiones del imperio, y las bases militares y efectivos norteamericanos en el Sur de Corea seran primeros blancos del contraataque militar de la RPDC.
